Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Dock Street

A wooden boardwalk known as Dock Street. Morning has broken and the first rays of sunshine can be seen shimmering down. The sun has risen and the hustle and bustle of the city is audible. The midday sun is high in the sky and waves of heat can be seen shimmering off the wooden planking. The bright blue skies of the afternoon bathe every corner of the boardwalk in sunlight. The sun has set and the boardwalk is shadowed in the failing light. Evening has fallen and the boardwalk is dimmed. There is a slight chill in the air. Midnight has enveloped the silent boardwalk. A slight lightening of the sky bathes the boardwalk in an eerie light as dawn approaches. To the southeast, Dock Street continues. To the southwest is a pier. A small grassy area with trees is on the northwest side, and a curtain of vines extends from this area to the north side of the boardwalk. Some ducks are floating on the water. $[$place = ${IronClaw:Rooms:UrOutside};] {? | $(place.details:haybales:hidden) || Several soft, flaxen hay bales are scattered about. }
The west end of Dock Street.

A wooden boardwalk known as Dock Street is well lit by bright sunlight. is enfolded in the cloak of night. To the southeast, Dock Street continues. To the southwest is a pier. A grassy area borders the street on the northwest. Jagged rocks can be seen below the boardwalk. $[$place = ${IronClaw:Rooms:UrOutside};] {? | $(place.details:haybales:hidden) || Several soft, flaxen hay bales are scattered about. }
http://www.skotos.net/IronclawGame/images/maps/night/docktown/streets/dockstreet/dockst1a.jpg
a curtain of thick vines
A curtain of thick vines creep, entwine and climb behind the trees to the north.
A curtain of thick vines.
hidden passage in the vines

A curtain of thick vines creep, entwine and climb behind the trees to the northwest. You can make out a passage that someone has created when they pushed through the vines. It appears to lead into a cave.
A curtain of thick vines. You can make out a passage that someone has created when they pushed through the vines.
the southeastern road
To the southeast, Dock Street continues. In this direction, you can see:
the southwestern pier
To the southwest, is a pier. In this direction, you can see:
group of ducks

A fairly large group of ducks have settled in the shallower portion of the Bay of Auvrich. They come in a range of sizes and colors; some swimming, some searching the water for food, and others just milling about waiting for a generous passerby.
A fairly large group of ducks have settled in the shallower portion of the Bay.
the grassy area

A small grassy area with trees. A small break from the normal city environment has sprung up in this corner of Docktown. The grass and trees are fed by the breakwaters of the bay and seem to flourish with fervor and a strong will to survive.
A small grassy area with trees.
A small grassy area with trees.
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v621/ICMaps/Docktown/Streets%20and%20Squares/dockst1a.jpg
the rocks under the boardwalk

The jagged rocks of the shoreline are visible if one leans over the edge of the boardwalk and peers down, or if one looks down through the spaces between each of the wooden planks which make up the boardwalk itself. The waves crash against them endlessly.
These jagged rocks can be seen when leaning over the edge of the boardwalk, or while looking between the spaces between each of the boardwalk's planks.
a curtain of thick vines
A curtain of thick vines creep, entwine and climb behind the trees to the north.
A curtain of thick vines.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{Howling winds blow through the area, furiously shaking the rooftops and nearby objects as they pass.\|Endless scores of snowflakes cascade rapidly down from the sky to abruptly collide with surrounding objects.\|A crazy flurry of snow crashes down from the heavens to cover the area in a thick cloak of stark white.\|Large flakes of snow continuously pour from the winter clouds, hindering eyesight almost completely.\|A turbulent winter breeze blasts through the area, accompanied by an abusive flow of substantial snow from the heavens.\|A massive shower of snow gushes from the sky to crash into the high-growing piles of white upon the ground.\|Audible thuds and thops can be heard everywhere as large clusters of snow tumble gracelessly onto the ground. The ever-growing white blanket continues to increase in mass beneath the wintry sky.\|A collection of giant snowflakes swirl down from the roiling clouds above before merging clumsily into the enormous blanket of snow consuming the ground.\|A harsh, freezing breeze kicks up the snow covering the nearby buildings, sending it surging forth into the air.\|Heavy piles of snow continue to build upon the ground. You can hardly recognize any of the objects once familiar to you.\|A litter of sizable snowflakes spew from the sky to roughly collide in a splatter of white with the snowy rooftops.\|Unruly streams of snow bustle about the area, heavily smacking against nearby objects and people.\|The falling snowflakes thunk incessantly against your body to cover your clothing in a noticeable layer of white.\|Torrents of snow rain down from the sky to abuse your body and remind you of the less-than-enjoyable conditions outside.\|The winter storm kicks it up a notch, belting down thick patches of snow joined by bitterly icy winds.\|The spatterings of snow that have collected upon your clothes begin to seep through to the skin, chilling you to the bone.\|The stormy winter clouds discharge a thick and heavy burst of snow which promptly devours the ground and nearby objects in its cold embrace.\}
X[S] \{A curtain of thick vines creeps over the area.\|Vines entangle the trees here, slowly killing them.\}

X[S] \{Howling winds blow through the area, furiously shaking the rooftops and nearby objects as they pass.\|Endless scores of snowflakes cascade rapidly down from the sky to abruptly collide with surrounding objects.\|A crazy flurry of snow crashes down from the heavens to cover the area in a thick cloak of stark white.\|Large flakes of snow continuously pour from the winter clouds, hindering eyesight almost completely.\|A turbulent winter breeze blasts through the area, accompanied by an abusive flow of substantial snow from the heavens.\|A massive shower of snow gushes from the sky to crash into the high-growing piles of white upon the ground.\|Audible thuds and thops can be heard everywhere as large clusters of snow tumble gracelessly onto the ground. X[S] \{A curtain of thick vines creeps over the area.\|Vines entangle the trees here, slowly killing them.\}
